name: Tales of Pykz
description: Hello my name is Pykz, i'm the guardian of the lands of Aranthns, i was born of the divine tree Ygg's and so i own the elements of nature; for millions of years all the creatures of this kingdom rich in magic and light lived happily in harmony, but that would change with the fall of a crystal made of darkness, since this happened some creatures were infected with their evil power, and i as protector of these lands need to save them. For this i need to collect the crystals of nature and destroy the crystal of darkness so that our earth is saved.
